item.title: About
item.description: I’m a first-year master @Fudan DISC, supervised by Zhongyu Wei. Previously, I was a research intern @HKU NLP, supervised by Tao Yu. I earned my bachelor’s degree from @Beijing Institute of Technology. My main research interest is Natural Language Processing, and I care about the extended abilities of LLMs. Recently, I’ve focused on manipulating and benchmarking LLMs to solve practical code generation tasks, and I’m also interested in applications of RLHF.

item.title: 🥰Friends😋
item.description: Mengyu Bu Yifan Li Yuandong Pu Ruiqiao Qiu I spent a wonderful summer with them in Kunming, 2022 Tianbao Xie Chengxi Li Yiming Wang Shuyang Jiang Hongjin Su

item.title: Where Are We Going?
item.description: ChatGPT和GPT-4的出现给NLP从业者带来的影响是巨大的，我在知乎上看到了一个有趣的观点。

item.title: The Last Night
item.description: 现在是北京时间凌晨3:30，我和舍友正在通宵收拾行李，准备在凌晨5:00的时候坐班车离开学校。
